name: Query Input Parameter List
description:
This data type contains a segment field name and the list of values to be passed to the query processor.

Example: |@PID.5.1^EVANS|

fields.name: Segment Field Name
fields.description: This component contains the segment field name.

fields.name: Values
fields.description: This component contains the field value or values in the form "value1& value2 & value3"
